abilities.name: Perceptive Shot
abilities.effect: Deal 10 damage to every enemy Bloon spawned

abilities.name: Flurry of Arrows
abilities.effect: Deal 50 damage to all enemy Bloons

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.effect: Set target Bloon on fire. Burning Bloons take 30 damage per turn

abilities.name: Heat It Up
abilities.effect: Increase Damage of your Monkeys by 5

abilities.name: Flame Strike
abilities.effect: Sets all enemy Bloons on fire. Bloons already on fire take 200 Damage instead

abilities.name: Bloon Shield
abilities.effect: On Turn End: Last friendly Bloon gains 30 Shield

abilities.name: Act of Power
abilities.effect: Your next Power Card costs 4 less (minimum 0)

abilities.name: Summon Wolf
abilities.effect: Add a Wolf card to your hand

abilities.name: Nature's Shield
abilities.effect: On Turn End: Obyn gains 20 Shield

abilities.name: Spirit Strike
abilities.effect: Deal 100 damage to a Bloon and gain 2 Gold
